    • setupTableViews

      private void setupTableViews() throws SQLException
      This method is used to retrieve the appointments by month and the appointments by week and pass it into the populate table method, so that the appointments can be viewed by month or week.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • setupRadioButtons

      private void setupRadioButtons()
      This method sets up the action listener for the 'monthRadioButton'. I use lambda expressions to simplify the implementation of event handlers for changes in the selected property of the radio buttons. When the 'monthRadioButton' is selected, it changes the selected tab in the TabPane to the first tab (index 0). When the 'weekRadioButton' is selected, it changes the selected tab in the TabPane to the second tab (index 1).

    • populateTable

      private void populateTable(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Appointment> tableView, javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> appointments)
      This method sets up the appointments in the main appointment table (shows all appointments)
